definition: to hurry/to rush/to run quickly/to elope
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
erhua variant of 奔頭|奔头[ben4 tou5]

sentences.english: If one day we get very tired, we lost hope.
sentences.chinese: 如果有一天，我們太累了，感到沒有奔頭，只好放棄。

sentences.english: I'm just saying children give your life a purpose.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得，要孩子就是讓你的生活有個奔頭。

sentences.english: I'm just stating children give your life a motive.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得，要孩子就是讓你的生活有個奔頭。

sentences.english: If that evening to see the movie, it is a future day.
sentences.chinese: 如果當晚有想看的電影，日子就顯得很有奔頭。

sentences.english: Now, there's something to look forward to.
